title: Lux's snare is more effective than Varus's ult.
body:
Lux's snare is:
Longer ranged.
More likely to snare 2 people.
Lower cooldown.
More damage.

"But varus's ult can go through minions" yea, the only think his ult has over lux's snare, and lux's snare can still go through 1 minion and hit the champ behind it.

Varus's ult is literally a more inferior version of Lux's snare, which is a basic ability. 
Lux's snare is toxic AF.
